channel.title: Social on tehblog
channel.description: Recent content in Social on tehblog

item.title: I Am Getting Better at Drawing
item.description: It suddenly got really cold here and I haven’t been able to get out. So instead I’ve been drawing and experimenting with new styles. Looking back at my early drawings I am much better. You can watch my progress on deviantArt and fur affinity. Lately I’ve posted to fa, but usually I post to dA so check both out! Also be sure to follow my twitter as I usually post some sketches there.
